Title: Mastering Chat Modes in VS Code with Burke Holland
Author: Visual Studio Code
Description:
Burke joins the pod to talk about chat modes, how they are evolving, how you can use them as agents, and how he created Beast mode for GPT 4.1 that revolutionized working with this model.

Episode Links Customize chat and agents - https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/customization/overview Chat Agent Modes - https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/customization/custom-chat-modes Prompt Boost - https://promptboost.dev/ Awesome Copilot - https://github.com/github/awesome-copilot Beast Mode - https://burkeholland.github.io/posts/beast-mode-3-1/
